name: prisma-migrations
description: A Node.js library to manage Prisma ORM migrations like other ORMs

scripts.e2e:esm: bun run build && bun test tests/e2e/test.js
scripts.e2e:cjs: bun run build && bun test tests/e2e/test-cjs.js
scripts.e2e:cli: bun run build && docker-compose -f tests/e2e/docker-compose.yml up -d postgres-cli && bun test tests/e2e/cli-commands.spec.ts && docker-compose -f tests/e2e/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.e2e:bun: bun run build && docker-compose -f tests/e2e/docker-compose.yml up -d postgres-bun && bun test tests/e2e/bun-only.spec.ts && docker-compose -f tests/e2e/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.e2e:codelab-new: bun run build && docker-compose -f tests/e2e/docker-compose.yml up -d postgres-codelab-new && bun test tests/e2e/codelab-new-project.spec.ts && docker-compose -f tests/e2e/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.e2e:codelab-migrate: bun run build && docker-compose -f tests/e2e/docker-compose.yml up -d postgres-codelab-migrate && bun test tests/e2e/codelab-migrate-existing.spec.ts && docker-compose -f tests/e2e/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.e2e:all: bun run e2e:cli && bun run e2e:bun && bun run e2e:codelab-new && bun run e2e:codelab-migrate
scripts.clean: bun run clean:dist && bun run clean:turbo
scripts.clean:all: bun run clean && bun run clean:deps
scripts.rebuild: bun run clean && bun install && bun run build
scripts.precommit: bun run format && bun run lint && bun run build && bun run test
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run format:check && bun run lint && bun run build && bun run test-lib

author: Jeff Wainwright <me@jeffry.in> (https://jeffry.in)
